Description:
An attacker may execute an application as a SCR File using rundll32.exe desk.cpl,InstallScreenSaver

Author: Christopher Peacock @securepeacock, SCYTHE @scythe_io, TactiKoolSec
Sigma Repository: [GitHub](https://github.com/SigmaHQ/sigma)
Name: Rundll32 InstallScreenSaver Execution
Query: sourcetype='windows-sysmon' eql select * from _source_ where ((process_path like '%\rundll32.exe' and original_file_name = 'rundll32.exe') and command like '%installscreensaver%')
